name: Wollaton Hall
description: A grand Tudor-style historical manor located in Nottingham, England, serving as a public museum and park.

content.title: Overview
content.body: Wollaton Hall is an Elizabethan country house standing on a small but prominent hill in Wollaton Park, Nottingham, England. Built in the 1580s, it is a stunning example of Tudor architecture. Today, it serves as a natural history museum and is part of a public city park.

content.title: Film History
content.body: Wollaton Hall famously served as Wayne Manor, the home of Bruce Wayne, in the 2012 film _The Dark Knight Rises_. Key scenes featuring Christian Bale's character were filmed in and around the hall.

content.title: Visiting
content.body: Wollaton Hall is open to the public, boasting a museum and park grounds that offer tours, exhibitions, and events throughout the year. Visitors can explore the vast park lands, the deer park, gardens, and the hall itself.
